lessons.title: 1. Mobile Security Fundamentals
lessons.description: Learn about mobile security challenges and protection strategies

pages.title: Mobile Security Overview
pages.content: Mobile security involves protecting smartphones, tablets, and other mobile devices from various threats. It includes securing mobile applications, data, and network communications.

pages.title: Mobile Security Threats
pages.content: Common mobile security threats include malware, phishing, data leakage, insecure Wi-Fi, and device theft. Understanding these threats is essential for effective mobile security.

pages.title: Mobile App Security
pages.content: Mobile app security involves secure coding practices, proper authentication, data encryption, and regular security testing. It's crucial for protecting user data and preventing attacks.

pages.title: Quiz: Mobile Security
pages.question: What is the most common mobile security threat?
pages.explanation: Malware is one of the most common mobile security threats, targeting mobile devices through malicious apps, phishing, and other attack vectors.
